channel.title: Client Help please
channel.description: I try downloading a client and i press run client, It just pops up a little black box and goes away.. i even tried downloading other clients i get the same result.. please someone help:)

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Nick2trick Nick2trick
item.description:
@Nick2trick wrote:

dude do this, uninstall the client, and java. that happend to me once. just re-install java and the client.

gl ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @PoopNuggets PoopNuggets
item.description:
@PoopNuggets wrote:

– My enviarables –

(Top Section)

–ClassPath–
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

–Path–
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.

(Bottom Section)
–ClassPath–
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.

–Path–
;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.

Thats exactly how mines setup.

Now, is there anything wrong with them?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

What client version is it? 317? 508?..?

Is your run.bat with your other files and do you have an EGui?

If it’s with your other files and have an EGui.java…Use this batch code…

@ECHO OFF
TITLE blah blah title
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“PoopNuggets, post:1, topic:291960”]I try downloading a client and i press run client, It just pops up a little black box and
goes away… i even tried downloading other clients i get the same result…
please someone help:)[/quote]

This is server help…NOT client help…

Open up run.bat and add “pause” to the very end…(Right click. Edit.)

Read full topic
